title: Open Source Readiness
description: Prepare Moe for public open source release. Make it professional, welcoming, cross-platform, and easy to adopt.
architectureNotes:
Goals:
- Professional documentation and branding
- Cross-platform support (Windows, Mac, Linux)
- Multiple IDE support (JetBrains, VS Code)
- Easy installation and onboarding
- Community-ready (contributing guides, templates)
- CI/CD and quality gates
- Published packages (npm, marketplace listings)
epicRails: All docs must work for Windows, Mac, and Linux users
